Author: bakedeggwhites
Text: We’ll still be friends. I just kept using him as an excuse to make myself feel bad, and I had to relieve that tension of being more than friends.

Author: happyishpenguin
Text: I’m sorry to hear about your breakup :( I hope you’re ok and that the breakup doesn’t hurt you too badly, I know they suck big time.  I went through similar with my non-LDR bf, he expressed issues with girls who weren’t model-skinny, and I did *not* want him seeing me naked unless I was ~perfect~, so I ended things.
